short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clean your inbox. Control your attention.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
𝐁𝐥𝐨𝐜𝐤 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐁𝐨𝐭𝐬, 𝐆𝐞𝐭 𝐏𝐚𝐢𝐝
Your traditional spam filter still misses hundreds of time-wasting solicitations from anyone with your email. Charging even a penny for someone to reach your inbox silences this noise. Plus, you can always see who has tried to reach you and adjust your whitelist accordingly.

𝐒𝐞𝐭 𝐲𝐨𝐮𝐫 𝐫𝐚𝐭𝐞
Not only can you get paid to receive emails, but some companies will actually pay a fee for you to hear what they have to say. You set the price.

𝐖𝐡𝐢𝐭𝐞𝐥𝐢𝐬𝐭
MailWall automatically builds a whitelist of permitted senders from your contacts and previous correspondences.

𝐂𝐨𝐧𝐧𝐞𝐜𝐭 𝐲𝐨𝐮𝐫 𝐢𝐧𝐛𝐨𝐱
Use the MailWall chrome extension to manage your account & settings right from your Gmail inbox.

𝐑𝐞𝐝𝐞𝐞𝐦
When your balance gets large, you can withdraw it or donate to charity.

𝐒𝐡𝐨𝐰 𝐬𝐢𝐧𝐜𝐞𝐫𝐢𝐭𝐲 𝐭𝐨 𝐫𝐞𝐜𝐢𝐩𝐢𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐬
Serious about what you have to say? With MailWall, you're guaranteed to get your recipient's attention by paying them, even just a few pennies. Plus, we'll give you $5 of free credit to begin!
